argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ishlg.p | |- P = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | ishlg.i | |- I = ( Itv ` G ) |
| 3 |  | ishlg.k | |- K = ( c e. P |-> { <. a , b >. | ( ( a e. P /\ b e. P ) /\ ( a =/= c /\ b =/= c /\ ( a e. ( c I b ) \/ b e. ( c I a ) ) ) ) } ) |
| 4 |  | ishlg.a | |- ( ph -> A e. P ) |
| 5 |  | ishlg.b | |- ( ph -> B e. P ) |
| 6 |  | ishlg.c | |- ( ph -> C e. P ) |
| 7 |  | hlcomd.1 | |- ( ph -> A ( K ` C ) B ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_hlcomb | |- ( ph -> ( A ( K ` C ) B <-> B ( K ` C ) A ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> B ( K ` C ) A ) |
